column4: Strange.. I connect my new Nikon D60 and the camera import wizard opens and allows me to import the pic to Fspot. However I can't find the camera as a mounted device that I can just drag and drop from.  Any suggestions?
you need to mount the camera as a drive
my other digital mounts automatically.. Maybe this camera is just seen differently. I can't find it using "sudo fdisk -l".. do you know another way?
also isn't it already mounted to give fspot the ability to import directly?
